overview: Many marriages have dark and secret agreements. This is well known to LÃ¡zaro (Samuel Pacheco), who goes from practicing as a lawyer to working as a gigolo. He must only do one thing: satisfy the sexual needs of the wives of gentlemen who pay him to see them enjoy. However, in the course will begin to incur the cornudismo, a strange sexual practice. What consequences will this new job bring you?
title: Corneador
